Design Token System Test

Typography with GT America + GT Pressura
GT America for headings, GT Pressura for body text

Body Text Sizes

Extra Small Text (12px) - DEPRECATED for accessibility

Small Text (14px) - New minimum for captions/metadata

Base Text (16px) - Default body text

Large Text (18px) - Emphasis or lead paragraphs

Heading Hierarchy (GT America)

H1: Dashboard Title (36px)

H2: Section Header (30px)

H3: Card Title (24px)

H4: Subsection (20px)

H5: Label (18px)
H6: Small Label (16px)

Font Weights

Light Weight (300)

Normal Weight (400)

Medium Weight (500)

Semibold Weight (600)

Bold Weight (700)

Extra Bold Weight (800)

Data Context Example

MetricValueChange
Total Members12,543+12.3%
Active Users8,921-2.1%
Revenue$45,678+5.7%

Table data at 16px base, headers at 14px

Monospace Text (GT Pressura Mono)

const metrics = {
  revenue: 45678.00,
  members: 12543,
  retention: 0.892
}

Perfect for displaying data, IDs, and technical information

Font Loading Debug
Check if fonts are loading correctly

font-sans (should be GT Pressura):

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

font('heading') (Direct className - should be GT America):

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

font-mono (should be GT Pressura Mono):

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

How to debug:
1. Open DevTools → Elements/Inspector
2. Select each text sample above
3. Check the Computed styles → font-family
4. Also check Console for any font loading errors
5. Check Network tab → Filter by "Font" to see if .woff2 files are loading
